mapper.select: select id, gender, user_name userName, real_name realName, mobile mobile, email, last_login_time lastLoginTime, login_time loginTime, login_count loginCount, locked, gmt_create gmtCreate from t_sys_user

select r.id,r.`name`,r.parent_id parentId,r.parent_ids parentIds,r.icon,r.url from t_sys_user u,t_sys_user_role ur,t_sys_role role,t_sys_role_resource rr,t_sys_resource r where u.id = ur.user_id and ur.role_id = rr.role_id and rr.resource_id = r.id and role.id = ur.role_id and r.type in (2,3) and r.available = 1 and role.available = 1 and u.user_name = #{value} order by priority
